channel.title: What are the item codes to these following items
channel.description:
All rares. (Phat, Dragonmask ect.) Dragon. Abby Whip. All Runes.
and what I need to type (Not too sure) I think you do it like this. [Pickup::(Item code here),1<---(Amount of item)]

item.title: What are the item codes to these following items
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

If u open ure the mopar client
Then go to “Help” then u see a whole list and then click on “Items”

There u go

  • Svenimen S
